thread.title: IFA 2015: Sony Xperia Z5 Premium Officially Unveiled as World's First 4K Smartphone
thread.title_full: IFA 2015: Sony Xperia Z5 Premium Officially Unveiled as World's First 4K Smartphone - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: IFA 2015: Sony Xperia Z5 Premium Officially Unveiled as World's First 4K Smartphone
text: As expected, Sony Mobile unveiled the new Xperia Z5 family, which includes three new smartphones for the moment: Xperia Z5, Xperia Z5 Compact and Xperia Z5 Premium. We will be talking about the better-featured of the three, Sony Xperia Z5 Premium, which is also world's first smartphone to boast an incredible 4K display. Sony, the company that said earlier this year that it's not ready to launch a smartphone with Quad HD display has just released a handset with a 4K scree... Â»
